title: SIPERAB
description: SIPERAB (Sistem Informasi Penyusunan RAB) is a system made for the Office of Highways of Tangerang Regency in the Banten Province of Indonesia.

title: Darlinshop SG
description: Darlinshop.sg is an ecommerce website created for a client selling imported goods from around the world in Singapore.

title: Ummah Maternal
description: Ummah Maternal is a community created for doulas and healthcare practitioners targeting their services for pregnant women and mothers in Canada.

title: Mirium Digital
description: Mirium Digital provides solutions to various fields of business. Their service includes software and web development, consultation, and cloud services.

title: Auto Coin Trade
description: Auto Coin Trade provides the service of automatic transactions of Futures cryptocurrency. Real time transactions are done by reading price updates using websocket.

title: AturToko.id
description: AturToko is a website for a startup providing omnichannel services to marketplace sellers. Their products include OmniPos, BuatToko, and AturToko +.

title: eMAHA
description: eMAHA is a marketplace created for Mardicorp from Malaysia. It focuses on products and services provided by Malaysia's SMEs.

title: OmniPos
description: OmniPos is an omnichannel system created for AturToko as the core system used to connect marketplaces into a single dashboard.
